file_content.text: You don't... huh. You don't know what you're doing.
You don't... huh. You don't know what you're doing.
You don't know how many lies are at work. No idea what's... really going on.
Why don't you tell me, then?
Explain.
You'll find out on your own. Sooner or later. Heh....
You'll have plenty of time to explain in your cell.
I'm taking you prisoner.
No. I will not be taken. Poison... heh.
I don't need to hear any more from you.
Shut up and die. [Kill him]
It's really him. He's really dead.
I'm sorry about everything. I didn't know what he was planning. I can't believe he used me.
The ghost cell was playing a deep game... but we beat them.
He was crafty.
There was no way you could've known. Besides, it's over.
It's not your fault.
And I'm grateful for that.
So... what happens now? The cell is gone, but we're both here. I'm in no shape to fight.
If you hadn't run off and been captured, this might've gone smoother.
You shouldn't have left me.
I left a message for you. Like I said--I couldn't stay. I'm not an Imperial.
I guess that doesn't matter now. We're both here. I'm in no shape to fight. What do we do about it?
I can't let you go free. Come back to Dromund Kaas.
You need to surrender.
No. I know what's in store. Besides, I already gave you everything.
I'll die before I'll be your captive. You understand?
Let's say it was your choice. Tell me what you'd do.
What do you want?
Seriously? All I want is my freedom.
Part of me wants to stick around. You seem like good people. But I can't--you know?
Part of me wants to stick around. I really do like you. But I can't--you know?
You'd just leave? I thought we had something.
[Flirt] That's it, then?
Maybe we did. Not everything works out.
Really not happy, here....
But you won't give me that. You're an Intelligence agent. It's not how you're trained.
If you don't surrender, Intelligence will hunt you for the rest of your life.
If you run, it'll be hard.
I know. It's better than being a slave to tyrants.
Goodbye. If I see you again... I'll remember you were merciful.
I won't try to change your mind. Make a life for yourself somewhere new.
You can go free.
I--thank you. I won't forget this.
Goodbye. Try to remember... the other side isn't all bad.
It was a kind thing, sparing her. We're glad you did.
I'm not gonna ask--let's just not tell your bosses. We done?
Mia helped us. I wasn't going to kill her for that.
It was the right choice.
Of course. But we doubt all agents would've chosen the same.
What did I say about not asking? Come on. Might as well report back at the ship.
Goodbye, Mia. It was nice while it lasted.
Then it's over. [Kill her]
The Empire will fall--
You're the last terrorist here. You die and my job is done.
I'm cleaning up. [Kill her]
That's what I thought.
Is there anything more to this mission? Or have we finished here?
Even I'm feeling a little sick from all the blood. We done?
Mission complete. Let's get off-planet.
We're finished here.
Terrorists don't go free.
She had to die.
We didn't object. A threat to the hive cannot live.
Shall we go? More assignments await....
I was hoping you didn't like her. That just sounds cold.
Glad that's dealt with.
Of course. More assignments await....
Want to go somewhere with less sand? Maybe more people...?
There's nothing to discuss anymore.
Welcome, my child. I wondered whether you'd find your way.
I'm so sorry. I couldn't stop them....
I applauded you toward the end. You've trampled my garden, of course, but I admire your skills.
The Old Man. You trained the ghost cell.
You're the leader.
Indeed. So many students in this day and age. It's rewarding work.
Be careful. He'll kill you....
What happened? Are you alright?
Mia?
I'm not dying. Look after yourself. The Old Man....
Cute, but really--am I supposed to be scared?
I'm not impressed.
Scared? No. I want to see what comes naturally... however emotions surface on your flesh.
Be careful... the Old Man... he's dangerous.
Don't mind your friend. We found her in the spaceport and thought we'd bring her home.
We could've killed her, of course, but what reward would that be when she's served so well?
What are you getting at? What's Mia done?
"Served us"?
Everything I dreamed of.
She's not your problem. This is between us.
Let her go.
What hypocrisy. Your "problem" was with Milosh Varta, but that didn't keep you from murdering his wife.
And I have no intention of harming her.
You don't have to show off for my sake.
Nice disguise trick.
A trick of the light. Besides, after a while, changing becomes second nature. Surely you've noticed?
The truth is, I let Mia defect. From the moment she began training, I saw that she was weak. Unworthy.
I knew she would flee and turn on us. She was the perfect bait to lure an Imperial Intelligence Cipher.
You sacrificed your own people to meet me.
This was all planned.
A few, here and there. Such things are necessary.
If you really wanted to meet a Cipher, you should've come to Dromund Kaas.
There were easier ways.
Alas, I cannot trust Imperial hospitality.
Whatever you were planning, all you've arranged is your defeat.
Bad mistake.
I beg to differ.
We've been watching you. Learning your techniques. In Mos Ila, at the wind farm, in Exchange territory... syncing our motions with yours.
You're fantastically talented. You'll show us everything... and then we'll replace you inside your own organization.
You're fantastically talented. You'll show us everything... and then we'll replace you inside your own organization.
Imperial Intelligence won't be deceived that easily.
No one will believe you.
A Cipher's existence is a lie. Any mistakes will be dismissed as... psychological instability.
Of course, we'd rather have captured you before you killed so many, but all in all, I'd call the plan a success.
A Cipher's existence is a lie. Any mistakes will be dismissed as... psychological instability.
Of course, we'd rather have captured you before you killed so many, but all in all, I'd call the plan a success.
I don't want to fight you. Give up now, and I can be merciful.
You can still surrender.
Ha! Ha!
All of you--kill her.
Ha! Ha!
All of you--kill him.
Nice voice. You're dead
All that's left is your defeat and subjugation. The Eagle will triumph.
All that's left is your defeat and subjugation. The Eagle will triumph.
Away with you, child. You are no challenge for me.
Don't know that I've ever killed anyone quite so good-looking.
Nice face. You're dead.
Jest all you like. It changes nothing.
Jest all you like. It changes nothing.
